text.text_translated:
I work for an IT company in many countries. Its main office is in the USA. So I work from home and online. I do not travel to work. I do not make small talk with other workers.

I work on specific jobs. These jobs have a start and an end. I can change my work schedule easily. This is very important for me. I can take time off easily. My children need me for school shows. I can take time off for them. I can also see the dentist.

But there is a bad thing. I do not have set work times. So I often work late at night. Sometimes I do not eat dinner because I want to finish my work.

best_attempt.text_translated:
I work for a big IT company. Its main office is in the USA. So I work from home and online. This means I do not travel to work. I do not talk about unimportant things with other workers.

I work on separate tasks. This is very important for me. I can choose my work time. This means I can take time off easily. My children need me for school shows. Or I need to see the dentist. I can do these things.

But there is a bad thing. I do not have fixed work times. So I often work late at night. Sometimes I do not eat dinner because I want to finish my work.
